title: Schlemo - SCP-6108 Fanart
content:
[[>]]
[[module Rate]]
[[/>]]
[[=image https://i.imgur.com/vXmSuBe.png]]
Based on [https://scp-wiki.wikidot.com/SCP-6108 SCP-6108] by Malvarik. Go check it out. 

SCP-6108 was an article from DeptCon that stuck with me. Wacky business shenanigans tend to. The one image in the article gives a supposed photo of Schlemo, so I drew it and channeled my inner Costco to make a logo as well. Pretty happy with how this one came together!
author: DXL44
